synopsis.text: Can you imagine Jesus Christ and Buddha, the revered figures who founded Christianity and Buddhism, sharing a cramped Tokyo apartment as roommates? This hilarious anime brings together these two unlikely companions for a divine vacation on Earth. As they navigate the complexities of modern Japanese society, they must also conceal their true identities, a task that proves challenging when miraculous events seem to follow in their wake. From animals gathering around them to trees spontaneously bearing fruit, their holy presence is hard to hide. Will they manage to blend in and enjoy their earthly getaway, or will their heavenly hijinks reveal their true selves to the world? Join Jesus and Buddha on this comedic adventure and discover the answers for yourself!
